Package com.dua3.meja.model.poi

Class PoiWorkbook

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.meja.model.AbstractWorkbook<PoiSheet,PoiRow,PoiCell>
com.dua3.meja.model.poi.PoiWorkbook
All Implemented Interfaces:
Workbook, AutoCloseable, Iterable<Sheet>
Direct Known Subclasses:
PoiWorkbook.PoiHssfWorkbook, PoiWorkbook.PoiXssfWorkbook
public abstract class PoiWorkbook extends AbstractWorkbook<PoiSheet,PoiRow,PoiCell>
Implementation of the Workbook interface based on the Apache POI implementation.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    PoiWorkbook.PoiHssfWorkbook
    Concrete implementation of PoiWorkbook for HSSF-workbooks (the old Excel format).
    static class 
    PoiWorkbook.PoiXssfWorkbook
    Implementation of PoiWorkbook for workbooks using the XSSF format.

      Description copied from interface: Workbook
      Writes the workbook to a stream.
      Parameters:
      type - the file type to use
      out - output stream to write to
      options - special options to use (supported options depend on the file type)
      updateProgress - callback for progress updates; parameter is between 0.0 and 1.0 or Double.MAX_VALUE for indeterminate
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

    • getFactorWidth

      public float getFactorWidth()
      Calculates and retrieves the width factor for the default cell style's font. This method updates the factor based on the font characteristics, ensuring proper rendering.
      Returns:
      the calculated width factor as a float.
